author: srimanob
body:
Test with cmsDriver:

cmsDriver.py step1 --filein 'file:/afs/cern.ch/cms/PPD/PdmV/work/SpecialRequest14/CMSSW_6_2_8_EGammaGENSIM/src/measure/DYToEE_M_50_TuneZ2star_8TeV_pythia6_tauola_cff_py_GEN_SIM.root' --fileout file:step1.root --pileup_input 'file:/afs/cern.ch/cms/PPD/PdmV/work/SpecialRequest14/CMSSW_6_2_8_EGammaGENSIM/src/measure/MinBias_8TeV_cfi_GEN_SIM.root' --mc --eventcontent RAWSIM --runsScenarioForMC Run2012_AB_C_D_oneRunPerEra --pileup fromDB --datatier GEN-SIM-RAW --conditions START70_V7A::All --step DIGI,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:8E33v2 -n 30 --no_exec --geometry DB:Extended
title: Add files need for RunDependent
